plain_text:
United States Court of Appeals
                     For the First Circuit

No. 01-2709

                    UNITED STATES OF AMERICA,

                             Appellee,

                                v.

                         JOSÉ AMADO-NÚÑEZ,

                      Defendant, Appellant.


     The opinion of this Court, issued on February 6, 2004, should

be amended as follows:

     On page 4, line 1, replace "(2001)." with "(D.P.R. 2001).".
